Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to providing identification cards to incarcerated individuals upon release from incarceration
Summary: Directs the commissioner of corrections and community supervision, in consultation with the commissioner of motor vehicles, to develop a program to provide an identification card to each incarcerated individual upon the release of such incarcerated individual from custody.
LawCode: Add §11, Cor L; amd §§490 & 491, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to providing identification cards to incarcerated individuals upon release from incarceration
